text: The SQL collection agent collects rows from any database table and inserts them as UDRs into a workflow. When the workflow is executed the agent will execute a query in SQL, based on the user configuration, and retrieve all rows matching the statement. For each row, a UDR is created and populated according to the assignments in the configuration window. Note! Supported database commands depend on the JDBC driver of the database. The section contains the following subsections: SQL Collection Agent Configuration - Batch SQL Collection Agent Transaction Behavior - Batch SQL Collection Agent Input/Output Data and MIM - Batch SQL Collection Agent Events - Batch
title: SQL Collection Agent in Batch Workflows - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
